nodes.excerpt: In this post, I tried adding images inside my Markdown blogs. Using Gatsby, images can be optimized for better performance.
In this post, I tried adding images inside my Markdown blogs. Using Gatsby, images can be optimized for better performance.
In this blog, I practiced creating multiple Markdown posts. It helps me understand how Gatsby shows a list of blogs.
Today I explored GraphQL inside Gatsby! It is powerful because I can fetch only the data I want.
This is my first blog written in Markdown inside Gatsby!
